note: Software engineer, woodworker, teacher, artist, humanist.  I believe in the transformative power of transparency. I practice radical transparency in my fence business. I'm progressive. I believe education and healthcare should be a right of every person in the US. In addition to making fences and gates, I teach woodworking classes at Ace Makerspace in Oakland, CA.  I was a software engineer, architect and sometimes CTO for over three decades.
